plot outline: Baa Nale Baa is a horror movie being shot in Uttara Karnataka Hubli, Dharawad and Bidar surroundings. Baa Nale Baa is written on the front doors of several huts in rural villages and villagers believe that it keeps ghost away since Baa Nale Baa literally translates to, come tomorrow.
title: Baa Naale Baa
plot: Baa Nale Baa is a horror movie being shot in Uttara Karnataka Hubli, Dharawad and Bidar surroundings. Baa Nale Baa is written on the front doors of several huts in rural villages and villagers believe that it keeps ghost away since Baa Nale Baa literally translates to, come tomorrow.
